website_summaries.verdict: Chunky wood with simple lines that goes with any decor.
pros: Distressed finish for a vintage feel
Sturdy piece that can hold heavier items
cons: Despite the look, it’s not solid wood, but veneer and wood combo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table for my entrance hallway
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece for our entrance. We looked around everywhere for something that had some length to it. I think this was about 64 inches across. Perfectly happy with the quality. Easy to set up and many compliments from all our family and friends. Will be buying more from this collection soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Super heavy and solid. Was not expecting this to be so well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect console table, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table March 4th from OJ Commerce and it arrived Friday, March 11th. A week earlier then planned! It is perfect! Easy to put together, just the shelf and four legs! Looks great in my front entrance. I was deciding between this table at $320 and another at $950. So happy I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but damaged left back corner. I would have given it 5 stars if it wasn't damaged. I used wood glue & a sharpie marker to color it in.. Too heavy to send back... It looks nice in the dark foyer
customer_reviews.author: CINNAMON

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely beautiful! I was so surprised on how sturdy it is. It is long exactly what I needed! Beautiful black rustic look. It did have one minor scratch on the bottom shelf so I will contact the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy7447

customer_reviews.title: Veneer panel coming off
customer_reviews.text: I've had this table for about 8 months. I noticed the other day that the side panel of the table top is starting to come off. That side faces a window and perhaps gets warm. It's a shame. I'm not sure if I should glue it or rip it off and stain the particle board underneath. Otherwise it's a nice enough table for the money. Sturdy and went together very easily.
customer_reviews.author: kerrica

customer_reviews.title: Sold elsewhere for much more
customer_reviews.text: We found this table on another site and fell in love, but it was a bit expensive. We shopped and shopped online and discovered the very same table is sold by many, many different online retailers under different brand names--but all for considerably more money. We found it here on Amazon for just a bit over half price and took a chance, hoping it would be as sturdy and attractive as the more expensive "competitors". It is. Absolutely. The finish is flawless,, hints of dark brown under a satin black finish for the perfect amount of character. Very very solid and heavily built as well. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Peek

customer_reviews.title: the piece is great and was just as described
customer_reviews.text: Although it took a bit longer to receive than originally expected, the piece is great and was just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Spunk

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with this table
customer_reviews.text: Received my table yesterday!! It came via FedEx perfectly packaged!! I could not be happier with this table!! It is beautifully made and looks so nice in my living room. It is sold at Ashley Furniture for $650!!! I got this table for half that and it is the same table!!! If you are debating whether or not to buy don't hestitate, purchase it ASAP, you will not be disappointed!! Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Elegant! The best purchase I've made in years!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this console table! The instructions said to have 2 people to assemble but I actually assembled this by myself. Super easy, no hassle, it is a little on the heavy side but I managed just fine. I knew I wanted it before Fall arrived because I have tons of Fall decor that I wanted to display. If you are thinking it purchasing a nice console table then look no further! The four drawers are perfect, I just store my candle lighters and back up batteries for my string lights. Thank you Amazon for delivering such a nice, elegant product! I'm so glad I made this purchase! I can tell it will be around for generations to come!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Saw it in the Ashley store for over $650 and they wouldn't match the price. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well built
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have been looking for something like this for almost a year. I have found several nice tables listed for quite a bit more in price at the stores as well as online. I found this table and after reading the reviews I decided to purchase TWO tables since the price is so great. They were super easy to assemble. I didn't have any issues as some buyers had said they did. They are very Beautiful as well as well constructed. They fit well in each entry point. I am very please with them both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent!
customer_reviews.text: My track record hasn't been very good as of late with furniture buying off Amazon. lol It did come with a few minor imperfections, but nothing major. I'm 55 and no issue putting it together by myself. Very quick, and with clear and simple instructions. Wish it was a bit darker, but can happily live with it as is. For durability, stand tuned. Have matching end table coming too. Hope it matches!
customer_reviews.author: 2cents

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if expecting imperfect product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table. It's perfect for a foyer or as a sofa table. Here's the caveat. As mentioned in several reviews, there's a high probability this table will have some damage. That would explain why it's being offered for 150-200 less than Ashley Furniture. Mine arrived with cracks in the wood and a drawer I had to rig in order to close flush. So if you're ok with cracks in the wood or imperfections, then this is a perfect product. It's heavy and you definitely will NOT want to repackage this to ship back. So buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece and gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid piece of furniture (heavy, sturdy). Drawers have stoppers to keep from accidently pulling out completely. Fairly easy to put together with 2 people. It did have a strong smell when fresh out of the box but it's gone now. Note: tiny white spots in photo are just leftover static Styrofoam pieces so ignore those. This is well made and looks great. Goes well with our hardwood floors too. We're now thinking about getting some additional pieces from this collection.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece but...
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love the way this looks! Putting it together was ok. I did it with my two young boys, and I'm not particularly handy. There were no instructions. The only reason I gave this 4 rather than 5 stars is because one of the legs is shorter than the others! It's not just a bit shorter, it's a lot shorter making the table unstable. I actually put a piece of the styrofoam from the table's packaging under the short leg to fix the issue. It isn't visible and did the trick. It looks beautiful and I've gotten plenty of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: This thing does exactly what it needs to do. It looks nice and seems decently sturdy once put together but the assembly is rather difficult. Be sure to look for the instructions (ours were outside of the styrofoam on what happened to be the bottom of the box). Even then this seems unnecessarily complicated. As the first step is to remove the drawers that already come screwed in 😂. Overall it’s the look I wanted for a decent price - nice and wide, looks like real wood. Drawers slide ok.
customer_reviews.author: vallerie ducharme

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It took me about an hour to assemble this. It took me longer to unwrap all the very well packaged pieces and parts. It looks amazing and is super sturdy and heavy. I had to wax the drawers so they slide nicer as it was basically wood on wood. After a round of johnsons wax, everything is super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great looking console
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great looking console. I spent a lot of time researching other products and kept coming back to this. Only reason I didn't buy it at first glance is because I wanted something other than black but I'm happy with my purchase. And the product is so easy to assemble. So easy that I didn't even use the instructions manual. I greatly recommend this product. I wish they will make it in another color though.
customer_reviews.author: Abiscona, NYC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: Love this entryway table! Very beautiful, love the color, it’s a pretty black with brown. Very sturdy and was fairly simple to put together. I put it together all by myself while being 6 months pregnant. It has nice size drawers where you can fit sheets of paper in them. 5 stars just love!
customer_reviews.author: Maureena Bell

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sofa table for the entrance of my house. It sits directly behind my sofa and looks exquisite. It arrived in very good condition and was extremely well packed for shipping. The color is not a flat black, it's more of a distressed dark brownish/black color, stunning and rich looking. The only problem I had was the weight & needed someone else to help me flip it over. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase and will definitely buy Ashely Furniture again.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sofa table!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sofa table!! I bought this to match my end tables from the Ashley Galveston line. The finish is a dark brown/black and matte. It was easy to put together, took about 40 minutes with one person. It's very heavy and best with two people!!! Such great quality and definitely a piece you'll have for many many years!
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this purchase. I had been searching on and off for months to find a big, sturdy sofa/console table to add to the living room and this one did not disappoint. I love it. Even though the color is stated as black, it does have a lot of brown undertones and matches well with the rest of the dark brown pieces of furniture that are in the house. I was worried that it might not but it definitely does. Looks more high end than the price tag would indicate. Highly recommend this piece if you are looking for a sofa/console table.
customer_reviews.author: ilikestuff

customer_reviews.title: Was nice but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this few months back. The table is pretty sturdy. It was very nice when new but things started to peel off on the side. Dunno if its temperature or just happened to get a defective piece. Manufacturer or seller - hope they are listening.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeedea

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was great on the first table but the second table (loved the quality so much I purchased a second one), had an issue with a misaligned hole but eventually was able to finish assembling the table. This table is solid, strong and looks great. Love the heavy hard wood structure, hence, why we purchased two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drawers hang uneven after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I gave this piece a 4 star because the drawers hang uneven after a few months with nothing in them. It is was easy and quick to put together for someone that is not very handy. However, it does also scratch easily on the top. It is beautiful and fits nicely with my décor.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, but I had to help a little.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice piece. Looks good, sturdy. Would give five stars except there was a problem with one of the drilled holes not lining up (by more than a half inch) so I had to drill a new hole after spending an hour trying to figure out what was wrong and where I should drill. I’m sure this isn’t a problem with most of them, and since I was able to figure it out, I’m very happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Saff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price and fits perfect along the wall. It was easy to assemble but will take 2 people. It is pretty heavy which is good, especially if you have 2 little ones that like to climb on everything. It also comes with a child safety attachment so you can attach it to the wall. I am very pleased with my purchase. Oh and it’s $100. cheaper purchasing it on here than Ashley’s furniture. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Great table but defective :-(
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star however when I received it the bottom shelf has what appears to be water damage. I had it all put together before I realized and when I called Amazon they said I could either ship the whole thing back or they could credit me....The credit started out at 10% ( umm no) and ended up at 40%. I wish they could have just sent me a new bottom shelf but instead I took the 40% and now have a defective table :-/ Other than that the table is really nice and easy to put together. I had it together in less than 30 mins! It is very sturdy and not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crazy great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Box came visibly damaged - but luck was on my side and the damage was to the bottom of the lower shelf. I positioned it so that it was in the back underside where no one will ever see it. I used a black marker to touch up 2 or 3 other spots where the paint didn’t cover well. It is BLACK - not brown. I am 50+ female do-it-yourselfer and had no trouble assembling and positioning by myself. Delivery took 2.5 days - from placing my order to my doorstep. A lot of bang for my buck at $225 and free shipping. Crazy great deal. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kim E

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you’re looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and solid. Arrived well packaged too. A little pricey but it is worth it. The wood is strong and heavy. Easy to assemble. And thanks to the delivery people handling with great care for such a big and heavy item.
customer_reviews.author: Bassmann

customer_reviews.title: the drawers are great for holding your incidentals/remotes and looks great under our ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous !!!! It's narrow enough to not take up too much space, the drawers are great for holding your incidentals/remotes and looks great under our bedroom tv at our beach house, I bought some baskets for underneath and love the look. Solid, well made and easy to assemble, only had to add the legs to the top and install the bottom shelf, took about 10 minutes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Arey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Saw a lot of pictures of the dark wood, however I opted for the lighter wood to add to the table and chair collection I already had. Very easy to assemble. Even did it by myself. Highly recommend. Very sturdy and a beautiful piece
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Machristie

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa table for the price. Surprisingly solid and heavy. Looks great and the drawers work really well. I only gave it four stars because one drawer's face is a little crooked. But because it's a rustic and distressed piece of furniture, the defect doesn't bug me too much and doesn't warrant a send back.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe defaults/damaged from factory?
customer_reviews.text: Love this line. Got this to match my coffee table/chest and side table that I had previously purchased at Ashley. I put it together myself and was fairly easy. However, one of the draws does catch. It also has an area that needs sanding/buffing. The packaging wasn’t the greatest. Arrow was pointing to the wrong way up. Also, a pack of little plastic beads was in the box and had busted. Made a bit of a mess. Over all, I saved about $100 from getting from amazon, so I’d say it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the sofa stable as well as two side tables. Two of the pieces arrived damaged. The side table veneer is peeling back and there is a crack in the side of the sofa table. I don’t feel this occurred during shipping since the pieces were all packaged very securely. I’m still giving these four stars though, as I really like the distressed look and luckily I’m handy with paint and putty. All in all, they are heavy sturdy pieces and adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lo

customer_reviews.title: My obsession
customer_reviews.text: I stalked this table for about 6 weeks before we could get it. It's as perfect as I knew it would be except one leg is 1/4" shorter than the rest. I still love it, even with a folded piece of cardboard stuffed under one leg.
customer_reviews.author: Maux

customer_reviews.title: So in Love
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this table! Came mostly put together (just had to put the legs on). I was weary about the height, but it’s actually perfect! The finish is amazing. The sturdiness/solidity is worth the money. After spending close to 4 months looking for a table, I’m so glad I bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Good and the bad
customer_reviews.text: Great piece, looks exactly as pictured and the quality is great for the price. It's quite large and heavy which makes it sturdy. Very happy with this purchase. Shipping: first one arrived in 2 days with prime but was damaged. Amazon sent e replacement which took much longer to arrive. Second one was not damaged. Easy to assemble. Overall would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality - Beautiful Sofa Table
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this sofa table ! This is of the highest quality & the price is super reasonable - Highly recommend this sofa table. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for my living room!
customer_reviews.text: I love this console table! I debated for months, but I finally decided to buy it. I'm so glad I did!! My husband put it together in about an hour by himself. I can't wait to decorate it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Q

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Overall Solid and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Overall solid construction, easy assembly, and looks great. I knocked one star off because two of the small wooden blocks to the left and right and behind the drawer fronts (supposed to block light shining through the gaps around the drawers) arrived broken. They are a very lightweight wood (like balsa) and break easily. I replaced with better quality blocks and all is well. Still, I shouldn't have to make this repair.
customer_reviews.author: DJWRITER

customer_reviews.title: Looks good from afar, but afar from good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Several areas were damaged. Not worth the return process when it comes to ashley furniture. However I love the piece, just wish it came without the shipping flaws. Therefore 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this sofa table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sofa table. I use it in my entry way with a mirror above it and it looks great. Finally brings everything together. I looked for the perfect table for me and this is it. Worth the wait. I love that it has a casual look. It is very sturdy and easy to put together. Lot's of compliments from everyone that see's it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipment Damage :(
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful.... the only issues I have is it has chunks missing from shipment. Something that cost that much should be bundled better so it doesn't get damaged like it is!! Frustrating!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirl

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but defective
customer_reviews.text: beautiful solid gorgeous - but - 1 of the 4 legs cut is off so it's loose and no way to tighten. It will need some wood glue or something to fill in the gap. It's stable only because of the other 3 legs so I wont return it - I'll fix it the best I can, I love the table and don't want the hassle of assembling packing returning waiting for replacement, assembling etc and no guarantee the next will be better....
customer_reviews.author: HappyGoLucky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical as many reviews stated damage in transit, but there was no damage. This is a beautiful piece, fits well with my decor and looks expensive. Does not look cheap. Ridiculously easy to put together. I also bought the matching cocktail/coffee table and love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: bbgiraffe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little something for our dining room. This is GREAT! The price is so affordable, and it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sblair71

customer_reviews.title: Item came very damaged
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice product however it came with major damage as you can see by the pictures
customer_reviews.author: cindy compeaux

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as stated. Super easy to put together. Feels very sturdy and high quality. Works perfectly for our needs. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a beautiful mix of contemporary and farmhouse style. I wanted something easy to clean, substantial and stylish. This is it. Putting it together was easy but this is a heavy table. Get help picking it up because it because it will scratch the floor if you scoot it. My table arrived in great condition with no damage. I actually intended to use it as a hallway table, but it is too short and wide for that. It is a awkward height for putting keys and purses down from the garage entrance. It's perfect as a sofa table though.
customer_reviews.author: LizzDaig

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a sturdy nice heavy solid table.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy I purchased this table I thought about it because I don’t like buying on line hate if damaged I’d have to return but it came in perfect shape best if you have two to assemble. Nice sturdy table I used behind a sofa .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, Good Price, Eye catching, Real wood
customer_reviews.text: Likes: - Real wood - The quality of the product - The price of the product - Assembly is straight forward, attach legs, and bottom shelf Dislikes: - Packaging was pretty beat up so I was a bit skeptical as to if anything inside was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Meed Djoser

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, and for a good price.  Assembled myself
customer_reviews.text: I have it 4 stars. I wish it was a bit bigger. Overall great value for the price. It looks really nice and it wasn’t damaged on the way here. There was some small imperfections, but honestly because of the design you can’t hardly tell
customer_reviews.author: StarGazed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. Very well made, sturdy, could be used as a sofa table, console table, or buffet table.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome find on Amazon. I didn't think it was going to be as quality as it was, but it's really nice. This was a total impulse buy without approval from the smarter person in the house, but she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love my new entry table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! I looked for quite a while for my entry table and found this one on Amazon at a great price! Easy to put together, the hardest part was getting it out of the box, because it was packaged so secure. Quick delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: kgal

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great entry way table. I really like the distressed wood style and size. The drawers are perfect and it is sturdy. My boyfriend assembled it pretty quickly with a small bit drill. If you don't have this it might take a little more time to put together but it comes with a small socket wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and as described
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and my husband assembled it in about 20min. It is very attractive and seems sturdy. I am giving it 4 stars because: 1) small crack in the wood present on arrival, in an inconspicuous place at least 2) the drawers are not very smooth to open and close 3) in thinking someone will possibly get a splinter on some parts of it, not very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney loves prime

customer_reviews.title: Don't even hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Affordable and looks just like the picture! Really good buy for our family. Hardware is attached to the side of the cabinet. Very nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: R&B

customer_reviews.title: sticky drawers!
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly. pretty easy assembly. love the look. But 2 of the drawers are really REALLY hard to move in/out, almost seems like i may pull the handle off! 3rd one is kinda hard, 4th one is the only one that seems to move pretty freely, and this is even after spraying with liquid gold!
customer_reviews.author: SatanKitty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Well-made Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase. I just put this together (it was SO EASY and I did it alone), and it's beautiful! It's a very heavy, well-made piece and arrived in perfect condition. It is exactly what I needed for the space. It is sturdy, solid and looks amazing. I was so happy to see the drawers were already installed and ready to use. They are usually the hardest part of putting furniture together. I will warn those who have difficulty lifting heavy things, that it is substantial. If you can't get someone to help you, it could be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Mark4803

customer_reviews.title: I like the design of this sofa table
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this sofa table. it is looks like Pottery barn furniture. structure is sturdy and easy to assemble but when you touch it, black stain comes off. This is why I gave only 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J.J

customer_reviews.title: Not well constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of its looks great! However, it is not very sturdy, as it bends in the middle making it very difficult to open the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: jimmya1

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sofa table
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very nice piece of furniture and solid feeling. I'm not a huge fan of the manufactured 4x4 legs, but in the end they look really nice and compliment the farmhouse style dining table that I just made with a similar finish. Packaging was done very well, it probably takes longer to get it out of the box than it does to fasten the 12 bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Runner

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. seen bad review before but thought i would not be that unlucky. it turns out i had bad luck. the one i received has a large scratch at the top surface. i also saw screews scattered outside the plastic bag. is this a used one? i have to return it. it is a pretty large one. how to ship it back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it! It’s beautiful, solid and easy to put together. I had been looking at this console table on other sites for a while but then found it on Amazon and actually saved $140. I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Skowronski

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous table and you can't beat the price. Shipping was quick, easy to set up and no damage. I'm in love! This same table sells for $700 at Ashley's furniture, I was so excited when I found this deal! Recommend to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Seattlelite

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and arrived in great condition, no damage and packaging was substantial. I was able to assemble myself. I was actually going to purchase this from another website for more and thought I should check amazon first. Purchased for much less and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the table but the packing was poorly done Chip out of the top and the drawers were only halfway covered with foam wrap As a result the finish rubbed off the bottom edges of the drawers I touched up the damageGreat
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite pieces in my home. I was 6 months pregnant when it was delivered. I was able to bring it in my home and assemble it fairly easy. Took some creativity to move and handle some of the heavy parts by myself but it was no big deal. Love it! And such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Muña

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy and appears to be good quality. It is a veneer on compressed wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy and appears to be good quality. It is a veneer on compressed wood so don't let the heaviness fool you. Also had to re adjust the drawers as three were tight and one opened and closed smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Received box in bad condition and parts were exposed. Once opened, I noticed a scratch on the bottom shelf and a cut off part that had been reattached and painted over. Definitely a refurbished product. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M.

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid and nice looking piece of furniture. 3 Stars because it did not come with instructions, minor defect on the top. Will need to use some wood putty to fill and sand and then touch up, but have it covered with a vase until I get around to it. One of the drawers sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Miller

customer_reviews.title: what's not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: This table is everything I hoped for & more! Strong & sturdy piece of furniture in a world of cardboard knock-offs. It anchors the room & if assembled properly.. won't budge. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Friday the 7th with an expected delivery date of the following Friday the 14th. However it arrived today Monday the 10th. I was very weary about purchasing this item online. I had made a similar purchase last year from another site and it arrived wet and broken. However this package came well packed and undamaged!!! It ir very sturdy ans i put it together by myself in 25 minutes!!! AND IT LOOKS GREAT. THANKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DARRIN BOWEN

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This console table is everything! I love the modern rustic farmhouse feel! It is a solid sturdy piece that looks great in our entryway. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Love the rustic look. Easy to put together. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I found this at another store for nearly twice the price and bought on Amazon; couldn't be happier. It came with everything it needed for assembly and took about 30 minutes. It looks great and I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We were very pleased with this table.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, didn't take much to assemble, and looks like it should have costed more for it! Very happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The product is very nice but unfortunately it arrived with a damaged corner
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice but unfortunately it arrived with a damaged corner. Could be the shipping or the item itself is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Taif

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Good, durable piece of furniture for the price. Easy to assemble but took two of us due to the length and weight of the pieces. As others have mentioned, it's good size. Be sure to measure before you purchase. I also purchased the coffee table and end table from this collection. They have a rather large presence...so may not be good for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: MauiMar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable. I’m a cosmetologist and use this for my work station. The drawers hold brushes, clippers, hair ties, clips, and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Munoz

customer_reviews.title: I seen this at Ashley Furniture and I loved it but they wanted $700
customer_reviews.text: I seen this at Ashley Furniture and I loved it but they wanted $700.00 for it. I told them I found it on a different website for less and they wouldn't match the price even after showing them the website. So I continued my search and found it here on Amazon it was significantly less so I purchased it. It was very easy to assemble considering my husband and I are not the most handy of individuals. It is a great accent to our entry way.
customer_reviews.author: Cami H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service from Ashley's Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered without hardware over 2 weeks ago, still have yet to receive hardware to put together. Poor customer service from Ashley's Furniture. Over all very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this piece. Looks great and it sells for $200 more on most furniture websites. The side of mine is missing some stain but it looks ok considering the table has a rustic look. I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for the wall I needed this table for. And looks great....exactly what I was looking for and wanted!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of furniture. I love Ashley furniture. It’s built well to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: wil

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product overall...
customer_reviews.text: Table was easy to assemble. I normally look for instructions to be included; there were none, but I figured it out pretty quickly. It’s a pretty solid table, I like the rustic look, though I think the table is also fairly expensive. But, overall I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: ndistcher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! Heavy and sturdy. No chance that small child could tip it. I like it a lot. Looks elegant and of high quality. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly and most of all not a thousand pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and workmanship of this table!! Very easy assembly and most of all not a thousand pieces!! The drawers and tracks are awesome!! I would recommend this table to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Giusti

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It's gorgeous, versatile, and looks great everywhere. High quality and well built product. It shipped crazy quick and was well packed. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiea Gaudren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Just what I was looking for. Looked at multiple tables but couldn’t find anything else comparable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Mauk

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Table
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Way easy to assemble really just added the legs. Great price. Seen exact piece at different furniture and boutique shops for over 600 dollars. I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table, it is sturdy and looks absolutely beautiful, very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Happy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a narrower taller table to put my plants on and this is perfect. I looked at several web sites for this product and found it the most inexpensive here. It is a solid built and is good quality. Love the little drawers for storing my snipping tools and fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Old Lady 57

customer_reviews.title: Just as nice as what is at Ashley's Furniture store but costs less
customer_reviews.text: Just as nice as if we had ordered it from Ashley's Furniture, but quite a bit less than if we had purchased it there. However, Ashley's does deliver and put it together for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful new addition to my home! Its sturdy and looks amazing in my entryway. I put it together which speaks to the ease in which it can be done = ) Looking for a true piece of furniture that I believe will be around for many years then Look no further. This is heavy and solid!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this sofa table, I looked a long time for a table like this. I read the many positive reviews and took a chance on ordering. It arrived in a damaged box, the table had a deep scratch but not in an obvious place, just added to the character of table so no big deal. I placed really nice glass knobs on drawers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M.

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. It's exactly what I wanted. But it came with no hardware. When I called the company they said I could ship the item back for a replacement. As I had already removed every piece from the box, that wasn't happening. Ended up buying bolts from True Value.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

product_meta.title: Signature Design by Ashley - Gavelston Console Table, Rubbed Black Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Brown/Black| Style Name:Sofa TableInspired by the sheer simplicity and weatherworn beauty of primitive furniture, this sofa table brings a relaxed sense of style into your space. Show off accent pieces on the bottom shelf, while concealing whatnots in the handy drawers.
feature_bullets: CLEAN LINES: Console table crafted from veneers, wood and manmade wood; Weight : 97 pounds
SUBTLE RUSTIC TOUCHES: Hand applied lightly weathered finish with antiqued bronze tone hardware
SPACIOUS TABLETOP: Square console table measures 64 W x 15 D x 30 H inches
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy to follow instructions, hardware and tools included
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries; The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses; For every taste and budget
CASUAL CHIC CONSOLE TABLE: Classic accent table is the perfect fit for any living room; Features include a lightly weatherworn finish, 4 handy drawers and a fixed lower shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars524 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
